result.title: The initial model to design SHARP diets, based on nutritional adequacy and preliminary sustainability metrics
result.description: D73 The initial model to design SHARP diets based on nutritional adequacy and preliminary sustainability metrics 36This deliverable will report on Task 72 and 73 It will present a first model using Multiple Integer Linear Programming MILP andor other mathematical modelling techniques allowing tradeoff assessments of SHARP indicators in nutritionally adequate diets and uses data from the SFNS Assessment pillar and literature
